content:
Here is an outline for an online form to onboard a radio host job at a community radio station:

1. Personal Information:
* Work Email (required)
* Best Email (optional)
* Phone Number (required)
* Address, City, State, Zip (required)
* T-Shirt Size (optional)
* Hoodie Size (optional)
2. Onboarding Documents:
* Onboarding Document 1 (required)
* Onboarding Document 2 (required)
* Onboarding Document 3 (required)
3. Show Information:
* Show(s) (required)
* Show Start Date (required)

Note: The form should have a submit button at the end, which when clicked, will send all the filled information to the community radio station.

As an additional note, to make the form more user-friendly, it's a good idea to clearly label each field, and use appropriate input types (e.g. email, phone number) to make it easy for the user to fill out the form.
Also, you may want to consider adding a captcha to prevent spam submissions.
